A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely hard to do it worse. Not only it is a failed movie but also deprived The Force Awakens of any interest it could have previously had and made Ep. IX uninteresting since it left absolutely nothing to look forward to. I am not even a Star Wars fan but this movie feels so disrespectful to the original idea of Star Wars that it's hurtful to watch (and also boring)
